Text.Page:
The state of this place, with all the corpses lined up, speaks volumes about the miserable lives the sub-devan slaves have.

This particular corpse is still clutching an old and dirty kerchief, with something carefully wrapped up inside.

Inside the dirty kercheif there is a single piece of stale bread...clearly once someone's most treasured possession.<TEXTBUTTON>What's in here?</TEXTBUTTON><EVENTPAGEBUTTON>You held onto it...you can keep it.</EVENTPAGEBUTTON>
